mapper.update: UPDATE CLAIM_CALCULATION_VARIETY SET REVISION_COUNT = REVISION_COUNT + 1, AVERAGE_PRICE = #{dto.averagePrice, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, AVERAGE_PRICE_OVERRIDE = #{dto.averagePriceOverride, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, AVERAGE_PRICE_FINAL = #{dto.averagePriceFinal, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, INSURABLE_VALUE = #{dto.insurableValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, YIELD_ASSESSED_REASON = #{dto.yieldAssessedReason, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, YIELD_ASSESSED = #{dto.yieldAssessed, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, YIELD_TOTAL = #{dto.yieldTotal, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, YIELD_ACTUAL = #{dto.yieldActual, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, VARIETY_PRODUCTION_VALUE = #{dto.varietyProductionValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CLAIM_CALCULATION_VARIETY_GUID = #{claimCalculationVarietyGuid}
mapper.select: , V.VARIETY_NAME FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION_VARIETY T JOIN CROP_VARIETY V ON V.CROP_VARIETY_ID = T.CROP_VARIETY_ID WHERE T.CLAIM_CALCULATION_GUID =#{claimCalculationGuid} ORDER BY V.VARIETY_NAME
